tile.name: cursed_corsair
tile.description: A weather‑worn pirate silhouette, draped in algae‑stained coat, with a glowing fungal prosthetic arm and a rusted cutlass, embodying the cursed spirit of the Drowned Maw.

player.back_history: Archetype: The Cursed Corsair, a former first mate of Mara "Black Tide" Voss who survived the mutiny only to be marked by the Lumenmycel. Backstory & Motivation: Once bound by loyalty to the pirate queen, the character was betrayed and left for dead in the depths of the Drowned Maw. The fungal spores fused with his flesh, granting eerie powers but a relentless curse that whispers the ghostly shanty of Mara. Driven by a desperate need for redemption and a burning desire to either break the fungal curse or harness its power to claim the cavern as his own pirate empire, he returns to the Maw armed with stolen maps and a vendetta. Visuals: He wears a tattered tricorn hat stained with bioluminescent slime, a leather coat patched with rusted iron plates that pulse faint teal where the fungus has seeped into his skin. His left arm is a twisted wooden prosthetic entwined with living vines that glow softly. He wields a rusted cutlass whose blade is etched with sigils that flicker with fungal light, and a flintlock pistol that fires phosphorescent shot. The overall silhouette is a grim, algae‑slicked pirate silhouette against the dim, teal‑glowing corridors of the cavern.

tile_with_texture.name: cursed_corsair
tile_with_texture.description: A weather‑worn pirate silhouette, draped in algae‑stained coat, with a glowing fungal prosthetic arm and a rusted cutlass, embodying the cursed spirit of the Drowned Maw.

texture.tileset_description: A demon wielding a trident. He is not wearing armor.

items.description: A shallow flooded vestibule where the waterfall curtains the hidden mouth of the cove. Dim shafts of filtered light pierce the mist, illuminating algae‑slick stone and the first rusted planks. The air smells of brine and damp wood, while distant waves crash and the faint shanty drifts. Soft teal glows from scattered bioluminescent fungi provide the only reliable illumination.
items.name: The Sunken Entrance

wall_tile.name: weathered_stone_wall
wall_tile.description: Rough stone slabs covered in a thin film of algae and occasional barnacle clusters, damp to the touch.

floor_tile.name: slime_moss_floor
floor_tile.description: A slick, moss‑covered stone floor that glistens with moisture and faint phosphorescent spores.

wall_tile_with_texture.name: weathered_stone_wall
wall_tile_with_texture.description: Rough stone slabs covered in a thin film of algae and occasional barnacle clusters, damp to the touch.

texture.tileset_description: A floor with some small stones scattered around it.

floor_tile_with_texture.description: A slick, moss‑covered stone floor that glistens with moisture and faint phosphorescent spores.

texture.tileset_description: A floor with some small stones scattered around it.

items.description: Frayed rope bridges and splintered timber span across deeper water channels. Warm amber lanterns salvaged from wrecks flicker, casting dancing shadows on the water’s surface. The scent of rust and old tar mixes with the earthy musk of damp wood. Water drips echo, punctuated by the creak of each step and distant clicks of unseen crustacean predators.
items.name: The Rusted Walkways

wall_tile.name: rotted_wood_wall
wall_tile.description: Decayed wooden planks warped by fungal growth, their grain darkened and veins of bioluminescent veins pulsing faintly.

floor_tile.name: waterlogged_wood_floor
floor_tile.description: Wooden decking soaked through, slick with algae and occasional patches of glowing fungus.

wall_tile_with_texture.name: rotted_wood_wall
wall_tile_with_texture.description: Decayed wooden planks warped by fungal growth, their grain darkened and veins of bioluminescent veins pulsing faintly.

texture.tileset_description: A muddy floor.

items.description: Abandoned market stalls constructed from hull fragments now overrun by coral‑like fungal growths. Lanterns glow amber, but the dominant light is the rhythmic teal pulse of Lumenmycel clusters. The smell of stale fish and fermented rum lingers, while the low hum of ghostly shanties grows louder, urging wanderers deeper. Water ripples gently, reflecting the bioluminescent canopy.
items.name: The Coraline Market

wall_tile.name: fungal_coral_wall
wall_tile.description: Stone walls encrusted with coral‑shaped fungal protrusions that emit a soft teal glow.

floor_tile.name: glowing_coral_floor
floor_tile.description: A floor of broken hull fragments interwoven with luminous fungal coral, giving a spongy, slightly yielding surface.

wall_tile_with_texture.name: fungal_coral_wall
wall_tile_with_texture.description: Stone walls encrusted with coral‑shaped fungal protrusions that emit a soft teal glow.

texture.tileset_description: Stone brick wall.

floor_tile_with_texture.description: A floor of broken hull fragments interwoven with luminous fungal coral, giving a spongy, slightly yielding surface.

texture.tileset_description: A floor with some small stones scattered around it.

items.description: A cavernous chamber where the water deepens into a dark, almost black pool. Bioluminescent spores swirl in vortexes, creating eerie whirlpools that can pull the unwary. The air is heavy with a metallic tang and the faint scent of decay. Echoes of distant leviathan roars mix with the constant drip of water and the mournful shanty, now distorted and hypnotic.
items.name: The Abyssal Grotto

wall_tile.name: gelatinous_stone_wall
wall_tile.description: Stone transformed into a gelatinous, semi‑transparent membrane that pulses with fungal spores.

floor_tile.name: deep_water_floor
floor_tile.description: Cold, dark water covering the floor, shimmering with floating spores and occasional phosphorescent bubbles.

wall_tile_with_texture.name: gelatinous_stone_wall
wall_tile_with_texture.description: Stone transformed into a gelatinous, semi‑transparent membrane that pulses with fungal spores.

floor_tile_with_texture.description: Cold, dark water covering the floor, shimmering with floating spores and occasional phosphorescent bubbles.

texture.tileset_description: A muddy floor.

items.description: Twisted wooden cabins and armories now alive with sentient fungal vines. The lighting is a chaotic mix of amber lanterns, teal fungal glows, and occasional flashes of bioluminescent lightning. The smell is a pungent blend of rot, salt, and a sweet fungal musk. Spectral whispers of pirate curses echo, and the clatter of phantom swords can be heard as Abyssal Corsairs patrol.
items.name: The Corsair Quarters

wall_tile.name: living_wood_wall
wall_tile.description: Wooden walls fused with animated fungal vines that twitch and emit a faint teal aura.

floor_tile.name: tangled_vine_floor
floor_tile.description: A floor of interlaced wooden planks and thick fungal tendrils that shift underfoot, giving a spongy, unstable footing.

wall_tile_with_texture.name: living_wood_wall
wall_tile_with_texture.description: Wooden walls fused with animated fungal vines that twitch and emit a faint teal aura.

texture.tileset_description: Wooden wall with a window.

floor_tile_with_texture.name: tangled_vine_floor

texture.tileset_description: A floor with some small stones scattered around it.

items.description: The heart of the Maw: a colossal, pulsating fungal organism fused with the cavern's geology and the remnants of Mara's fleet. The Hive radiates an overwhelming teal glow, casting shifting shadows across walls of living stone and warped timber. The air is thick with spores that sting the lungs, carrying the intoxicating scent of ancient curses and sea‑salt. The shanty reaches a crescendo, a maddening lure. The soundscape is a cacophony of distant leviathan bellows, crackling fungal growth, and the metallic clang of ghostly cutlasses.
items.name: The Lumenmycel Hive

tile.name: heart_of_the_black_tide
tile.description: A pulsating, obsidian‑black crystal heart encased in living fungal veins, its surface rippling with teal bioluminescent threads and faint echoes of Mara's ghostly shanty. The heart beats with the trapped souls of the drowned crew, radiating a corrupting spore aura that tingles the air, making it unmistakably legendary among any loot.

final_objective.back_history: The Heart of the Black Tide is the cursed, still‑beating heart of pirate queen Mara "Black Tide" Voss, ripped from her chest during the mutiny and fused with the primal Lumenmycel fungus. When Mara fell, her blood‑soaked heart became the seed that birthed the Hive, its dark pulse feeding the fungal network and binding the souls of every drowned pirate to the cavern’s walls. The Hive’s toxic spore clouds and the maddening shanty that lures intruders are a direct emanation of the heart’s lingering will. Only by extracting the heart and carrying it out of the Drowned Maw can the corrupting influence be halted—either to shatter it and free the trapped souls, or to harness its power and command the fungal empire. Leaving it sealed in the depths would allow the Hive to grow unchecked, spreading the blight beyond the cavern and dooming the surface to a tide of fungal rot, while the player would forever be haunted by the queen’s curse. The heart must be taken to the surface to either end the curse or claim its dark legacy.

tile_with_texture.name: heart_of_the_black_tide
tile_with_texture.description: A pulsating, obsidian‑black crystal heart encased in living fungal veins, its surface rippling with teal bioluminescent threads and faint echoes of Mara's ghostly shanty. The heart beats with the trapped souls of the drowned crew, radiating a corrupting spore aura that tingles the air, making it unmistakably legendary among any loot.

texture.tileset_description: A very rare greatsword.
